com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp

Class ATTPDPEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp.PDPEngineFactory
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.ATTPDPEngineFactory

  • public class ATTPDPEngineFactory
extends PDPEngineFactory
    ATTPDPEngineFactory extends PDPEngineFactory by implementing the abstract newEngine method to create a ATTPDPEngine instance and initialize it with policies and PIP instances based on configuration information provided to the factory.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.4 $
    Author:
    car
